mapper.select: SELECT SID, SNAME, SINTRO, REVIEWSTAR, SLOCSHORT, LUNCH, DINNER, SMPHOTO, SLOC, SFOODSTYLE, SOPENINGHOUR FROM (SELECT DISTINCT S.SID, S.SNAME, S.SINTRO, TRUNC(AVG(V.REVIEWSTAR),1) REVIEWSTAR, S.SLOCSHORT, S.LUNCH, S.DINNER, S.SMPHOTO, S.SLOC, S.SFOODSTYLE, S.SOPENINGHOUR FROM SHOP S FULL OUTER JOIN REVIEW V ON S.SID = V.SID GROUP BY S.SID, S.SNAME, S.SINTRO, S.SLOCSHORT, S.LUNCH, S.DINNER, S.SMPHOTO, S.SLOC, S.SFOODSTYLE, S.SOPENINGHOUR) WHERE UPPER(SNAME) LIKE UPPER('%'|| #{searchValue} ||'%') OR UPPER(SLOC) LIKE UPPER('%'|| #{searchValue} ||'%') OR UPPER(SFOODSTYLE) LIKE UPPER('%'|| #{searchValue} ||'%')
